member.summary: Exloresoft design bespoke .NET WPF gauges, and we specialise in creating robust and graphically intuitive controls at an affordable price. For more information about our products go to http://www.exploresoft.net
BarGauge

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum property value. There is no limit set for this property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the gauge, by default it's set to 0 by incrementing this value the gauge will display graphically its position in the control never exceeding the maximum value.
